name: The Christmas Machine
description:
It's been a year since nobody has received gifts on Christmas anymore, what happened? People are worried.

You play the role of a young man who used to work at Santa's factory who gets a special message from the Mysterious Mr.Claus, telling you to come over at his factory and fix the Gift Delivery Machine so that the mountain of Gifts can be delivered every Christmas again.

NOTE: The game has an ending, the maze is just a little tricky so some of you might think that the game is unfinished. But there is and ending and you collect two not-so-hidden gems to open the gate.

I created this project on the first (1) December 2016 and took a small break around the 8th, then came back to working on it on the 26th and finally finished it today, the 28th of December (8:32 GMT+3). which results in a total of around 11 days. I decided to call it a day as soon as I finished the laser level.
